channel.title: Headband pic on Character Wiki page?
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Headband pic on Character Wiki page?"

item.title: Re: Headband pic on Character Wiki page?
item.content:encoded:
Ahh! It turns out that it was just some strange sort of lag in the systemâ€¦

It's fine now though! Sorry to trouble you *bows*.

item.title: Re: Headband pic on Character Wiki page?
item.content:encoded: At the bottom of the page that you want to see the headband, click on the "Files" button. Use that to upload a copy of your headband to this site, and then just point the headband link. You can check The Wiki Village source if you want a comparison.

item.title: Headband pic on Character Wiki page?
item.content:encoded: Okay, I know this is most likely a very easy thing to fix, but I am having troubles getting a stable headband graphic for my character Wiki page. Anything I try, always ends up as a pic of "Please visit Billy vs SNAKEMAN" or something. Any help would be great ^_^.
